sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; // javascript library that creates a parrallax effect import Rellax from "rellax"; // reactstrap components import { Badge, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, Container, Row, Col, } from "reactstrap";// core components import ScrollTransparentNavbar from "components/Navbars/ScrollTransparentNavbar.js"; import BlogPostsHeader from "components/Headers/BlogPostsHeader.js"; import FooterBlack from "components/Footers/FooterBlack.js"; // sections for this page import Carousel2 from "./index-sections/Carousel2.js"; function Testimonials1() { React.useEffect(() => { document.body.classList.add("Testimonials1-page"); document.body.classList.add("sidebar-collapse"); document.documentElement.classList.remove("nav-open"); window.scrollTo(0, 0); document.body.scrollTop = 0; // initialise Rellax for this page if (window.innerWidth >= 991) { setTimeout(function () { new Rellax(".rellax", { center: true, }); }, 5000); new Rellax(".rellax-header"); new Rellax(".rellax-text"); } // we need to add a script for the github buttons let script = document.createElement("script"); script.src = "https://buttons.github.io/buttons.js"; script.id = "github-buttons-script-id"; document.body.appendChild(script); return function cleanup() { document.body.classList.remove("Testimonials1-page"); document.body.classList.remove("sidebar-collapse"); // we need to remove the script when we change the page script.parentNode.removeChild(script); }; }); return ( <>

Simpler. Smarter. Faster.

Solafide Services is founded on our five essential core values.

Value

We are competitive and offer cost effective solutions for all parties.

Professionalism

No work will be performed without the utmost level of care and preparedness.

Flexibility

We are proud to serve you and will accomodate your needs accordingly.

Reliability

We want you to count on US.

Efficiency

Time is not to be wasted and we understand this. Getting the best for your money should not be time taking.

We have the edge on the competitors

Nobody works with the quality of materials we do. We make your time worthwhile.

Residential Services

We can get the job done and make it a pleasure for you.

REQUEST A QUOTE

Pavers

Your needs will be met with precision.

Pressure Washing

Let us show you how detailed we can be.

Painting

No project is too small for our team.

Pavers

Your needs will be met with precision.

Pressure Washing

Let us show you how detailed we can be.

Painting

No project is too small for our team.



Commercial Services.

Companies of all sizes can rely on our work.

REQUEST A QUOTE

Our quality is undisputed

Here are some pictures from our work sites.

); } export default Testimonials1;
